featured.name: Calendar++
featured.description: Smart menu bar calendar for macOS with Google Calendar integration and liquid glass design.

projects.name: RAG-Vis Playground
projects.description: Interactive visualizer for RAG security, covering fundamentals, adversarial attacks (poisoning, injection), and multi-stage defense mechanisms.

projects.name: RAGDefender
projects.description: A resource-efficient defense mechanism against knowledge corruption attacks in practical RAG deployments.

projects.name: pickleguard
projects.description: A defense tool that detects and prevents malicious pickle payloads through static analysis and opcode inspection.

projects.name: iChat
projects.description: An intelligent RAG-based chatbot leveraging retrieval-augmented generation for enhanced conversational AI.

projects.name: korean_slang_detector
projects.description: LLM-based Korean drug slang detection system using TF-IDF augmentation and context-aware attention model.
